pages.text:
LAZY LOBSTER NOW OFFERS ONSITE AND OFFSITE CATERING!
Lazy Lobster provides a wide range of services designed to meet your catering needs for any occasion so your event is perfect. Host your special event indoors or out here at our award winning Key Largo restaurant or we can prepare Chef Lupe's exquisite Keys style dishes at your location in our fully equipped, licensed catering trailer where our chefs will personally create the menu you choose, complete with waitstaff. Pick up platters are also available
You are welcome to use one of the menu options below that we have used for previous dinners or you may choose items from our regular menus to make your own customized special menu. Our catering  menus are priced per person, including tax and tip so you will know what to expect…
email us
for details or call 305-451-0565
Sample Buffet Menu #1
Salad (Choose One)
House Salad
Caesar Salad
Entrees
Prime Rib
Slow roasted with au jus, hand carved and served with our homemade horseradish sauce
Lazy Catch
Encrusted with panko breadcrumbs, sautéed and topped with fresh diced tomatoes, scallions, shredded parmesan cheese and key lime butter
Shrimp Carbonara
Sautéed with onions, mushrooms, bacon and green peas in alfredo sauce, served over penne pasta
Sides (Choice Of 2)
Potato Du Jou
r
Vegetables Du Jour
Rice Du Jour
Sample Buffet Menu #2
Salad (Choose One)
House Salad
Caesar Salad
Bread
Banana Bread
Dinner Rolls
Entrees
Lazy Catch
Encrusted with panko breadcrumbs, sautéed and topped with fresh diced tomatoes, scallions, shredded parmesan cheese and key lime butter
Jumbo Coconut Shrimp
Encrusted with shredded coconut, deep-fried, served with mango chutney
Chicken Marsala
Sautéed with fresh mushrooms in a Marsala wine cream demi-glaze
Sides (Choice Of 2)
Potato Du Jou
r
Vegetables Du Jour
Rice Du Jour

Shrimp Key West
Sautéed with fresh basil, tomatoes, garlic and a light tomato cream sauce, served over penne pasta
Prime Rib
Slow roasted with au jus, hand carved and served with our homemade horseradish sauce
Sides (Choice Of 2)

CONTACT THE LAZY LOBSTER
LAZY LOBSTER SEAFOOD RESTAURANT
Mile Marker 102, Bayside
102770 Overseas Highway Key Largo, FL
EMAIL
lazylobsterinthekeys@gmail.com
Phone number 305 -451-0565
